name: BattlePoly: Low-Poly Battlefield
description:
Battlefield like with low-poly/stylized graphic. This prototype have conquest mode only. And some FPS features like: gun customization, vehicle, ...

Set in near future, where the world got destroyed by natural disaster. Nations's government fallen apart. World economy became unstable. Military started to gain control and named themselves as "Under-no-flag".

This is a very early build/prototype so it is buggy and unstable. This lord is for the final game so don't expect it in this prototype :)
